# ListExtensions.GetValidIndex&lt;T&gt; method

Returns a valid index to use in this List.

```csharp
public static int GetValidIndex<T>(this List<T> items, int index)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type element |
| items | Target list |
| index | Reference index |

## Return Value

A valid index.
